title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer, Object Storage
summary: The Apple Services Engineering (ASE) team powers the App Store, Apple TV, Apple Music, Apple Podcasts, and Apple Books on a massive scale.
description: Support and maintain object store orchestration service measuring and monitoring availability, latency and overall system health...
preferred_qualifications: Lower level understanding of the Linux Operating System, standard networking protocols, and components...
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role...
